transcript:
so this is one crazy tip to get rid of
your anxiety it's a psychological term
called anxiety reappraisal next time you
get anxious say to yourself out loud I
am excited I am excited the reason why
is because the physical signature of
anxiety and excitement inside of the
body are almost identical your heart
rate goes up with both considerably your
breathing shortens your body releases
the stress hormones adrenaline and
cortisol and you get sensory alertness
the reaction in the body for anxiety and
excitement is almost identical so what's
the difference your thoughts about the
situation is what is different so next
time you feel anxiety starting to creep
in try anxiety reappraisal and try to
make yourself excited about a situation
that you were just anxious about
